footerImage.description: This logo will identify your store, and will differentiate it from the others. Preferably use a .PNG image, equal to or greater than 68 x 276 pixels without a background.
footerImage.title: Footer image

headerImage.description: This logo will identify your store, and will differentiate it from the others. Preferably use a .PNG image, equal to or greater than 68 x 276 pixels without a background.
headerImage.title: Header image

logo.description: This image will serve as an identifier in the browser tab that your customers use to use your store. Preferably use a .PNG image, equal to or greater than 512 x 512 pixels.
logo.title: Favicon
